entry.title: WIND WARNING, Edmonton (Int'l Aprt)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 a.m. MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with showers. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 at times overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
